summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the improvement of 5th Ave. from Spring Street to Olive Way, making an appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund reimbursable from funds to be received under the Federal Aid "M" Program and to the extent permitted by law from monies to be received from Local Improvement District 6684 authorized and created by Ordinance 106117 for the purpose of paying so much of the cost of the improvement as constitutes a special benefit to the properties abutting.
